title: pnpm build error
body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
I am a beginner and I follow the [documentation](https://docs.optimism.io/builders/chain-operators/tutorials/create-l2-rollup) to build my own L2. When I run to the [location](https://docs.optimism.io/builders/chain-operators/tutorials/create-l2-rollup#build-the-optimism-monorepo) ,run pnpm build , the following error occurs
        ✖  nx run @eth-optimism/contracts-bedrock:build
       > @eth-optimism/contracts-bedrock@0.16.2 prebuild /home/weizp/work/gows/src/github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/packages/contracts-bedrock
       > ./scripts/verify-foundry-install.sh
       
       Using foundry version: forge 0.2.0 (3d6bfdd 2023-12-16T00:17:23.049683682Z)
       
       > @eth-optimism/contracts-bedrock@0.16.2 build /home/weizp/work/gows/src/github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/packages/contracts-bedrock
       > forge build
       
       Compiling 1 files with 0.5.17
       Compiling 324 files with 0.8.15
       Solc 0.5.17 finished in 38.99ms
       Compiling 129 files with 0.8.19
       Solc 0.8.19 finished in 14.24s
       Error: 
       solc exited with signal: 9 (SIGKILL)
       <empty output>
        ELIFECYCLE  Command failed with exit code 1.
       
       

 ———————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

 >  NX   Ran target build for 8 projects (4m)
 
    ✔    2/3 succeeded [2 read from cache]
 
    ✖    1/3 targets failed, including the following:
         - nx run @eth-optimism/contracts-bedrock:build
 
   View structured, searchable error logs at https://nx.app/runs/sOc3IaTMFk

**System Specs:**
 - OS:ubuntu 20.04
 - Package Version (or commit hash):8b39517e9b0c47e41f4c70b976fb2abbe20df5c1
other version
![1702715625843](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/assets/33245656/55a856b4-d070-458e-a80b-2d2420cc27c9)

Can someone tell me why this error occurred? Thank you very much.

The cause has been identified. Out of memory.
solc requires up to 12 G of memory.
